content:
Asset is tagged - Developer
Skip to content
Events when an asset is tagged
Â¶
When an
asset
is tagged in Atlan, the following event is emitted.
CLASSIFICATION_ADD
Â¶
Atlan always emits a
CLASSIFICATION_ADD
event when an asset is tagged.
For both direct tags and propagations
Remember that these events will be emitted for both the asset that was directly tagged as well as all assets to which the tag is propagated.
2022-11-07
2024-10-01
